Hihi all  as I’m a new to this miles games  may I know if that’s sufficient for my daily spending by using Citi rewards + amaze for for online + offline spending  and dbswwc for travel spending?My monthly spending usually around 1k+. Thank you!
Sounds good  though you might want to consider adding the SC Smart card to capture public transport spending  the points earned there can be converted to miles as well
I feel sc smart card is better as a cashback card. To earn enough to redeem miles isnt easy (minimum 10k miles to redeem)
Agree with this  and high risk of points becoming orphan
just wondering  if for usual online spending I can just use my Citi rewards card directly  while for offline spending  I have to use the amaze card  right?
There are a few offline MCCs that can use the Citi card directly but for ease offline just all go through amaze for fuss-free

Hi all  I am new here. can anyone please tell me which credit cards are the best for miles strategy? I currently own UOB krisflyer and DBS Altitude visa card. Plus UOB One card. But im thinking of changing these cards for UOB Ladies card or citi rewards cards.I’m more focusing on travel and foreign transaction categories.Which card will be good for this?Thank you!!
Slowly sign up the miles card to gain the signup bonus miles then after that decide which bank you like to stick with.
Can u get uob lady sol? If yes  travel and dining/family cat so you can still clock uob one acct interest.
DBS WWMC for online travel/FX  points pool with Altitude. If using UOB One Account  UOB Lady's to clock $500 spend.
I can’t get uob ladies sol. Does uob pink card and city rewards will be a good combo?
Should try applying. Many stories of ppl not meeting 120k and still got it. Else  UOB lady pink and Citi rewards with amaze is good as well.
I believe that advice is for naked citi rewards card. Pairing with amaze can just do recurring. Amaze will convert it to online for you.

Dont think can use cardup for hdb related fees
any one holding uob reserve or uob visa infinite metal here?

Anybody got experience making online down payment for hotel restaurants? I'm making an online down payment for Si Chuan Dou Hua restaurant at Parkroyal on Beach Road. Was planning to use UOB Lady's Solitaire with my chosen dining category  but the payment request came from Parkroyal on Beach Road instead (screenshot). Does this mean I won't get any miles if I use UOB Lady's Solitaire? And should I use a miles card with travel (hotel) bonus or online spend cards (like amaze + citi rewards combo or DBS WWC) instead?
Citi can't be used for travel btw. Dbs wwmc seems to be the safest. Is ur lady sol not on travel category?
Oh ya.. forgot about that. Yup  it's currently on dining and fashion for this quarter  and the payment can't wait till next quarter for the change in category haha!
